entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having muttered.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A person with dark powers, mentioned as having wheedled information from the Gray Lady and retrieved a diadem.

entities.name: gray lady
entities.description: A person who had lost the diadem and was tricked by Voldemort into revealing its location.

entities.name: diadem
entities.description: An object that was hidden in a forest and retrieved by Voldemort.

entities.name: borgin and burkes
entities.description: A place where Voldemort worked after leaving Hogwarts.

entities.name: albanian woods
entities.description: A secluded forest that served as a refuge for Voldemort.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school where students learn magic and where Voldemort worked before leaving.

relationships.description: Voldemort tricked the Gray Lady into revealing the location of the diadem.
Voldemort retrieved the diadem from its hiding place in the forest.
The Albanian woods served as a refuge for Voldemort.
Voldemort worked at Borgin and Burkes after leaving Hogwarts.
Harry mentioned Voldemort in his muttering.
